grassland.name: Grassland
grassland.description: Fertile plains perfect for farming and settlement.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: Dense woodlands providing lumber and shelter.

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: Towering peaks rich in minerals but difficult to traverse.

ocean.name: Ocean
ocean.description: Deep waters impassable by land units.

coast.name: Coast
coast.description: Shallow waters along the shoreline, rich in fish.

river.name: River
river.description: Flowing freshwater providing irrigation and fish.

lake.name: Lake
lake.description: Still freshwater bodies supporting diverse wildlife.

plains.name: Plains
plains.description: Open flatlands suitable for settlement and grazing.

beach.name: Beach
beach.description: Sandy shores between land and sea.

floodplains.name: Floodplains
floodplains.description: Fertile lowlands enriched by seasonal flooding, ideal for agriculture.

meadow.name: Meadow
meadow.description: Open grasslands with wildflowers, good for grazing.

rolling_hills.name: Rolling Hills
rolling_hills.description: Gentle slopes suitable for herding and light farming.

sharp_hills.name: Sharp Hills
sharp_hills.description: Rugged terrain with steep slopes, good for grazing hardy livestock.

steppe.name: Steppe
steppe.description: Vast semi-arid grasslands ideal for pastoral herding.

savannah.name: Savannah
savannah.description: Tropical grasslands with scattered trees, supporting diverse wildlife.

marsh.name: Marsh
marsh.description: Waterlogged wetlands rich in reeds and aquatic plants, challenging to traverse but valuable for fiber harvesting.

food.name: Food
food.description: Sustains your population and allows growth.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: Durable building material for advanced structures.

tools.name: Tools
tools.description: Crafted implements that improve work efficiency and enable new activities.

fiber.name: Fiber
fiber.description: Raw plant material gathered from reeds and grasses, used for weaving cloth and cordage.

clothing.name: Clothing
clothing.description: Woven garments that protect against the elements and improve quality of life.

clay.name: Clay
clay.description: Malleable earth extracted from deposits, shaped and fired to create pottery and building materials.

pottery.name: Pottery
pottery.description: Fired clay vessels for storage, cooking, and trade. Essential for food preservation and daily life.

honey.name: Honey
honey.description: Sweet golden nectar harvested from managed bee colonies. A precious luxury used for food, medicine, and trade.

population.name: Population
population.description: The workforce that powers your civilization.

admin_capacity.name: Administrative Capacity
admin_capacity.description: Determines how many buildings your city can manage efficiently.

research.name: Research
research.description: Advances your knowledge and unlocks new technologies.

copper_deposit.name: Copper Deposit
copper_deposit.description: A rich vein of copper ore ready for mining.

fertile_soil.name: Fertile Soil
fertile_soil.description: Exceptionally rich earth that increases agricultural yields.

clay_deposit.name: Clay Deposit
clay_deposit.description: A site rich in workable clay, ideal for pottery production.

longhouse.name: Longhouse
longhouse.description: A large communal dwelling serving as the center of your settlement. Provides basic storage, housing, and administration.

hut.name: Hut
hut.description: A simple thatched dwelling providing basic shelter for a small family.

hunters_lodge.name: Hunter's Lodge
hunters_lodge.description: A base for hunting expeditions into nearby forests. Produces food from game and contributes to animal husbandry knowledge.

fishing_hut.name: Fishing Hut
fishing_hut.description: A small shelter near water for fishermen. Harvests fish from nearby coasts, rivers, and lakes.

gathering_hut.name: Gathering Hut
gathering_hut.description: A shelter for foragers who collect wild plants, berries, and wood from the surrounding land.

food_cache.name: Food Cache
food_cache.description: A protected storage pit for preserving food supplies. Reduces spoilage through cool, dry conditions.

cleared_field.name: Cleared Field
cleared_field.description: An organized area for storing wood, stone, and tools. Keeps materials dry and accessible.

flint_knapper.name: Flint Knapper
flint_knapper.description: A workshop where skilled craftsmen shape stone into useful tools through precise flaking techniques.

cultivated_plot.name: Cultivated Plot
cultivated_plot.description: Tilled soil prepared for planting crops. More productive than foraging, especially near water sources.

herding_grounds.name: Herding Grounds
herding_grounds.description: Fenced pastures for raising livestock. Best suited for hilly terrain with good grazing.

granary.name: Granary
granary.description: An elevated storage structure protecting harvested grain from moisture and pests. Significantly reduces food decay.

crop_field.name: Crop Field
crop_field.description: Well-tilled agricultural land with proper irrigation and soil management. Produces abundant harvests but requires more tools to maintain.

pasture.name: Pasture
pasture.description: Enclosed grazing land with managed rotation and water access. Supports larger herds on highland terrain.

tribal_camp.name: Tribal Camp
tribal_camp.description: An organized settlement with multiple structures around a central gathering area. Provides greater administrative capacity for expanding communities.

pit_house.name: Pit House
pit_house.description: A semi-subterranean dwelling with an earth-covered roof. Maintains stable temperatures and accommodates more residents, but requires clothing for comfort.

reed_marsh.name: Reed Marsh
reed_marsh.description: A managed wetland area for harvesting reeds and cattails. The gathered plant fibers are essential for weaving and cordage.

weaver.name: Weaver
weaver.description: A workshop equipped with a loom for producing cloth from plant fibers. Skilled weavers transform raw fiber into durable clothing.

storytellers_fire.name: Storyteller's Fire
storytellers_fire.description: A communal gathering place where elders share knowledge and traditions around a sacred fire. Produces research and gains bonuses from nearby housing.

woodcutter.name: Woodcutter
woodcutter.description: A logging camp where workers harvest timber from nearby forests. Must be built on or adjacent to forest terrain.

clay_pit.name: Clay Pit
clay_pit.description: An excavated site for extracting clay from deposits in the earth. The raw clay is used for pottery and construction.

pottery_kiln.name: Pottery Kiln
pottery_kiln.description: A domed oven for firing clay into durable pottery. Transforms raw clay into vessels for storage and trade.

elders_dwelling.name: Elder's Dwelling
elders_dwelling.description: A respected elder's residence where wisdom is preserved and shared. Produces significant research but requires comfort, sustenance, and honey as a luxury.

apiary.name: Apiary
apiary.description: A collection of woven skep hives where bees are kept for honey production. Thrives near flowering crops and meadows.

city_center.name: City Center
city_center.description: The heart of your city, providing basic resources and administration.

farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Produces food to feed your population.

house.name: House
house.description: Provides housing for your growing population.

road_dirt.name: Dirt Road
road_dirt.description: Basic road allowing faster movement for caravans.

agriculture.name: Agriculture
agriculture.description: The science of cultivating plants and livestock.

construction.name: Construction
construction.description: Techniques for building structures and infrastructure.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Extracting valuable minerals from the earth.

animal_husbandry.name: Animal Husbandry
animal_husbandry.description: The breeding and care of domesticated animals.

gathering_and_crafting.name: Gathering & Crafting
gathering_and_crafting.description: Skills in collecting natural resources and crafting useful items.

oral_tradition.name: Oral Tradition
oral_tradition.description: The preservation and transmission of knowledge through spoken word and storytelling.

philosophy.name: Philosophy
philosophy.description: Abstract reasoning and contemplation about existence, knowledge, and values.

mysticism.name: Mysticism
mysticism.description: Spiritual practices and beliefs connecting humanity to the divine and the natural world.

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.description: Healing arts using herbs, treatments, and knowledge of the body.

warfare.name: Warfare
warfare.description: Military tactics, weapons, and defensive strategies.

communication.name: Communication
communication.description: Methods of transmitting information across distances and preserving knowledge.

governance.name: Governance
governance.description: Systems of leadership, laws, and social organization.

diplomacy.name: Diplomacy
diplomacy.description: The art of negotiation, alliances, and peaceful relations between peoples.

engineering.name: Engineering
engineering.description: Applied sciences for designing and building complex structures and machines.

material_science.name: Material Science
material_science.description: Understanding and manipulating materials like metals, ceramics, and alloys.

transportation.name: Transportation
transportation.description: Methods of moving people and goods across land and water.

public_administration.name: Public Administration
public_administration.description: Managing resources, taxation, and public services for larger populations.

natural_sciences.name: Natural Sciences
natural_sciences.description: Systematic observation and understanding of the natural world.

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: Harnessing natural forces like fire, water, and wind for productive use.

timber_framing.name: Timber Framing
timber_framing.description: Wooden structural frameworks enabling larger and more durable buildings.

pack_animal_domestication.name: Pack Animal Domestication
pack_animal_domestication.description: Taming animals to carry loads and assist in hunting.

foraging.name: Foraging
foraging.description: Systematic knowledge of gathering edible plants and useful materials from the wild.

natural_shelter.name: Natural Shelter
natural_shelter.description: Using caves and natural formations for protection and storage.

lithic_reduction.name: Lithic Reduction
lithic_reduction.description: Shaping stone through controlled flaking techniques to create tools.

digging_sticks.name: Digging Sticks
digging_sticks.description: Simple pointed tools for breaking soil and planting seeds.

livestock_domestication.name: Livestock Domestication
livestock_domestication.description: Raising animals for food, milk, and other products.

seed_selection.name: Seed Selection
seed_selection.description: Choosing and saving the best seeds for planting, improving crop yields over generations.

soil_tillage.name: Soil Tillage
soil_tillage.description: Breaking and turning soil to improve aeration and nutrient availability for crops.

pastoral_management.name: Pastoral Management
pastoral_management.description: Organized practices for rotating grazing land and maintaining healthy herds.

post_and_lintel.name: Post and Lintel
post_and_lintel.description: Architectural technique using vertical posts and horizontal beams to create sturdy structures.

mudbrick.name: Mudbrick
mudbrick.description: Creating durable building materials from clay, straw, and water, dried in the sun.

cordage_and_weaving.name: Cordage and Weaving
cordage_and_weaving.description: Techniques for twisting fibers into rope and interlacing threads to create cloth.

fire_mastery.name: Fire Mastery
fire_mastery.description: Controlled use of fire for warmth, cooking, and protection against predators.

hafted_axes.name: Hafted Axes
hafted_axes.description: Stone axe heads bound to wooden handles, enabling efficient woodcutting and construction.

pottery_kiln.name: Pottery Kiln
pottery_kiln.description: Firing clay at high temperatures to create durable, waterproof vessels.

oral_tradition.name: Oral Tradition
oral_tradition.description: Systematic preservation of knowledge through memorized stories, songs, and teachings.

apiculture.name: Apiculture
apiculture.description: The art of managing bee colonies in woven hives to harvest honey and wax. Requires understanding of both animals and flowering plants.

agriculture_1.name: Plant Domestication
agriculture_1.description: Understanding which plants can be cultivated. Unlocks basic farms.

agriculture_2.name: Irrigation
agriculture_2.description: Controlling water flow to increase yields. Unlocks granaries.

construction_1.name: Mudbrick Construction
construction_1.description: Creating durable building materials from clay and straw.

settler.name: Settler
settler.description: Brave pioneers who can establish new cities.

caravan.name: Caravan
caravan.description: Traders who transport goods between cities.

agricultural_society.name: Agricultural Society
agricultural_society.description: Your civilization has mastered the art of farming, becoming experts in food production.
